formulae.formula: \begin{pmatrix}  j \\  m \quad m'\end{pmatrix}:= \sqrt{2 j + 1}\begin{pmatrix}  j & 0 & j \\  m & 0 & m'\end{pmatrix}= (-1)^{j - m'} \delta_{m, -m'}

formulae.formula: \sum_{j_7 j_8} (2j_7+1)(2j_8+1)  \begin{Bmatrix}    j_1 & j_2 & j_3\\    j_4 & j_5 & j_6\\    j_7 & j_8 & j_9  \end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix}    j_1 & j_2 & j_3'\\    j_4 & j_5 & j_6'\\    j_7 & j_8 & j_9  \end{Bmatrix}  = \frac{\delta_{j_3j_3'}\delta_{j_6j_6'} \begin{Bmatrix} j_1 & j_2 & j_3 \end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_4 & j_5 & j_6\end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_3 & j_6 & j_9 \end{Bmatrix}}         {(2j_3+1)(2j_6+1)}
formulae.semanticFormula: \sum_{j_7 j_8} (2j_7+1)(2j_8+1)  \Wignerninejsym{j_1}{j_2}{j_3}{j_4}{j_5}{j_6}{j_7}{j_8}{j_9} \Wignerninejsym{j_1}{j_2}{j_3'}{j_4}{j_5}{j_6'}{j_7}{j_8}{j_9} = \frac{\delta_{j_3j_3'}\delta_{j_6j_6'} \begin{Bmatrix} j_1 & j_2 & j_3 \end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_4 & j_5 & j_6\end{Bmatrix} \begin{Bmatrix} j_3 & j_6 & j_9 \end{Bmatrix}}{(2j_3+1)(2j_6+1)}

Mathematica.translation: p[n_, x_, a_, b_, c_, d_, q_] := Product[QPochhammer[Part[{a*b , a*c , a*d},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{a*b , a*c , a*d}]}]*(a)^(- n)* QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), a*b*c*d*(q)^(n - 1), a*Exp[I*\[Theta]], a*Exp[- I*\[Theta]]},{a*b , a*c , a*d},q,q]
Q[n_, x_, \[Alpha]_, \[Beta]_, N_] := HypergeometricPFQ[{- n , - x , n + \[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ 1}, {\[Alpha]+ 1 , - N + 1}, 1]

formulae.formula: x(1-x) \frac {\partial^2F_1(x,y)} {\partial x^2} + y(1-x) \frac {\partial^2F_1(x,y)} {\partial x \partial y} + [c - (a+b_1+1) x] \frac {\partial F_1(x,y)} {\partial x} - b_1 y \frac {\partial F_1(x,y)} {\partial y} - a b_1 F_1(x,y) = 0
formulae.semanticFormula: x(1-x) \deriv[2]{\AppellF{1}@{a}{b_1}{b_2}{\gamma}{x}{y}}{x} + y(1-x) \frac{\pdiff[2]{\AppellF{1}@{a}{b_1}{b_2}{\gamma}{x}{y}}}{\pdiff{x}\pdiff{y}} + [c - (a+b_1+1) x] \deriv[1]{\AppellF{1}@{a}{b_1}{b_2}{\gamma}{x}{y}}{x} - b_1 y \deriv[1]{\AppellF{1}@{a}{b_1}{b_2}{\gamma}{x}{y}}{y} - a b_1 \AppellF{1}@{a}{b_1}{b_2}{\gamma}{x}{y} = 0

Mathematica.translation: x*(1-x) * D[AppellF[a, Subscript[b, 1], Subscript[b, 2], \[Gamma], x, y], {x,2}] + y*(1-x) * D[AppellF[a, Subscript[b, 1], Subscript[b, 2], \[Gamma], x, y], x, y] + (c - (a+Subscript[b, 1]+1)*x) * D[AppellF[a, Subscript[b, 1], Subscript[b, 2], \[Gamma], x, y], x] - Subscript[b,1] * y * D[AppellF[a, Subscript[b, 1], Subscript[b, 2], \[Gamma], x, y], y] - a*Subscript[b,1]*AppellF[a, Subscript[b, 1], Subscript[b, 2], \[Gamma], x, y] == 0

definiens.definition: family of basic hypergeometric orthogonal polynomial

Mathematica.translation: JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], z] == Divide[Pochhammer[\[Alpha]+ 1, n],(n)!]*HypergeometricPFQ[{- n , 1 + \[Alpha]+ \[Beta]+ n}, {\[Alpha]+ 1}, Divide[1,2]*(1 - z)]

Maple.translation: JacobiP(n, alpha, beta, z) = (pochhammer(alpha + 1, n))/(factorial(n))*hypergeom([- n , 1 + alpha + beta + n], [alpha + 1], (1)/(2)*(1 - z))

formulae.semanticFormula: \contdualHahnpolyS{n}@{x^2}{a}{b}{c} = \genhyperF{3}{2}@{- n , a + \iunit x , a - \iunit x}{a + b , a + c}{1}

\JacobipolyP{\alpha}{\beta}{n}@{x} = \lim_{t\to\infty} t^{-n} \contHahnpolyp{n}@{\tfrac12 xt}{\tfrac12(\alpha + 1 - \iunit t)}{\tfrac12(\beta + 1 + \iunit t)}{\tfrac12(\alpha + 1 + \iunit t)}{\tfrac12(\beta + 1 - \iunit t)}

Mathematica.translation: JacobiP[n, \[Alpha], \[Beta], x] == Limit[(t)^(- n)* I^(n)*Divide[Pochhammer[Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 - I*t) + Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 + I*t), n]*Pochhammer[Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 - I*t) + Divide[1,2]*(\[Beta]+ 1 - I*t), n], (n)!] * HypergeometricPFQ[{-(n), n + 2*Re[Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 - I*t) + Divide[1,2]*(\[Beta]+ 1 + I*t)] - 1, Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 - I*t) + I*(Divide[1,2]*x*t)}, {Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 - I*t) + Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 + I*t), Divide[1,2]*(\[Alpha]+ 1 - I*t) + Divide[1,2]*(\[Beta]+ 1 - I*t)}, 1], t -> Infinity]

definiens.definition: case of the continuous Hahn polynomial

formulae.semanticFormula: p_n(x ; a , b , c|q) = a^{-n} \expe^{-\iunit nu} \qmultiPochhammersym{ab\expe^{2\iunit u} , ac , ad}{q}{n} * \qgenhyperphi{4}{3}@{q^{-n} , abcdq^{n-1} , a\expe^{\iunit{(t+2u)}} , a\expe^{-\iunit t}}{ab\expe^{2\iunit u} , ac , ad}{q}{q}

Mathematica.translation: p[n_, x_, a_, b_, c_, q_] := (a)^(- n)* Exp[- I*\[Nu]]*Product[QPochhammer[Part[{a*b*Exp[2*I*u], a*c , a*d},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{a*b*Exp[2*I*u], a*c , a*d}]}]* QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), a*b*c*d*(q)^(n - 1), a*Exp[I*(t + 2*u)], a*Exp[- I*t]},{a*b*Exp[2*I*u], a*c , a*d},q,q]

formulae.semanticFormula: p_n(x ; a , b , c \mid q) = \frac{\qmultiPochhammersym{ab , ac}{q}{n}}{a^n} \cdot \qgenhyperphi{3}{2}@{q^{- n} , a\expe^{\iunit \theta} , a\expe^{- \iunit \theta}}{ab , ac}{q}{q}

Mathematica.translation: p[n_, x_, a_, b_, c_, q_] := Divide[Product[QPochhammer[Part[{a*b , a*c},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{a*b , a*c}]}],(a)^(n)] * QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), a*Exp[I*\[Theta]], a*Exp[- I*\[Theta]]},{a*b , a*c},q,q]

formulae.formula: Q_n(x;a,b,N;q)=\;_{3}\phi_2\left[\begin{matrix} q^-n & abq^n+1 &  x \\ aq & q^-N  \end{matrix} ; q,q \right]

Mathematica.translation: Q[n_, x_, a_, b_, N_, q_] := QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(-)* n , a*b*(q)^(n)+ 1 , x},{a*q , (q)^(-)* N},q,q]

title: Orthogonal polynomials on the unit circle

formulae.formula: P_n(x) = c_n \, \det \begin{bmatrix}m_0 & m_1 &  m_2 &\cdots & m_n \\m_1 & m_2 &  m_3 &\cdots & m_{n+1} \\&&\vdots&& \vdots \\m_{n-1} &m_n& m_{n+1} &\cdots &m_{2n-1}\\1 & x & x^2 & \cdots & x^n\end{bmatrix}
formulae.semanticFormula: P_n(x) = c_n  \det \begin{bmatrix}m_0 & m_1 &  m_2 &\cdots & m_n \\m_1 & m_2 &  m_3 &\cdots & m_{n+1} \\&&\vdots&& \vdots \\m_{n-1} &m_n& m_{n+1} &\cdots &m_{2n-1}\\1 & x & x^2 & \cdots & x^n\end{bmatrix}

Mathematica.translation: p[n_, x_, a_, b_, q_] := QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), a*b*(q)^(n + 1)},{a*q},q,x*q]
p[n_, x_, a_, b_, c_, q_] := QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), a*b*(q)^(n + 1), x},{a*q , c*q},q,q]
P[n_, x_, a_, b_, q_] := Divide[1,Product[QPochhammer[Part[{(b)^(- 1)* (q)^(- n)},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{(b)^(- 1)* (q)^(- n)}]}]]* QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), a*q*(x)^(- 1)},{a*q},q,Divide[x,b]]

P[n_, \[Alpha]_, x_, q_] := Divide[Product[QPochhammer[Part[{(q)^\[Alpha]+ 1},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{(q)^\[Alpha]+ 1}]}],QPochhammer[q, q, n]]*QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), (q)^(\[Alpha]/2 + 1/4)* Exp[I*\[Theta]], (q)^(\[Alpha]/2 + 1/4)* Exp[- I*\[Theta]]},{(q)^(\[Alpha]+ 1), 0},q,q]

definiens.definition: family of basic hypergeometric orthogonal polynomial

translations.Mathematica: p[n_, x_, a_, q_] := QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), 0},{a*q},q,q*x] == Divide[1,Product[QPochhammer[Part[{(a)^(- 1)* (q)^(- n)},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{(a)^(- 1)* (q)^(- n)}]}]]*QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- n), (x)^(- 1)},{},q,x/a]
y[n_, x_, a_, q_] := QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(- N), - a*(q)^(n)},{0},q,q*x]

formulae.formula: P_{n}(x;a\mid q) = a^{-n} e^{in\phi} \frac{a^2;q_n}{(q;q)_n} {_3}\Phi_2(q^-n, ae^{i(\theta+2\phi)}, ae^{-i\theta}; a^2, 0 \mid q; q)
formulae.semanticFormula: P_{n}(x ; a \mid q) = a^{-n} \expe^{\iunit n\phi} \frac{\qmultiPochhammersym{a^2}{q}{n}}{\qmultiPochhammersym{q}{q}{n}} \qgenhyperphi{3}{2}@{q^- n , a\expe^{\iunit(\theta + 2 \phi)} , a\expe^{- \iunit \theta}}{a^2, 0}{q}{q}

Mathematica.translation: P[n_, x_, a_, q_] := (a)^(- n)* Exp[I*n*\[Phi]]*Divide[Product[QPochhammer[Part[{(a)^(2)},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{(a)^(2)}]}],Product[QPochhammer[Part[{q},i],q,n],{i,1,Length[{q}]}]]*QHypergeometricPFQ[{(q)^(-)* n , a*Exp[I*(\[Theta]+ 2*\[Phi])], a*Exp[- I*\[Theta]]},{(a)^(2), 0},q,q]
LegendreQ[v, \[Mu], x] == Cos[(\[Mu]*Pi)]*(Divide[1 + x,1 - x])^(\[Mu]/2)*Divide[Hypergeometric2F1[v + 1, - v, 1 - \[Mu], 1/2 - 2/x],Gamma[1 - \[Mu]]]

Maple.translation: LegendreQ(v, mu, x) = cos((mu*Pi))*((1 + x)/(1 - x))^(mu/2)*(hypergeom([v + 1, - v], [1 - mu], 1/2 - 2/x))/(GAMMA(1 - mu))

definiens.definition: Ferrers function of the second kind
Ferrers function of the first kind

title: Incomplete Bessel K function/generalized incomplete gamma function

Mathematica.translation: K[v_, x_, y_] := Integrate[Divide[Exp[- x*t -Divide[y,t]],(t)^(v + 1)], {t, 1, Infinity}]

definiens.definition: type generalized-version of incomplete gamma function
